      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(int x,
            int y,
            int t,
            int rgb)
        Sets the RGB value at the specified pixel and with possible the surrounding pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the pixel.
        y - The y coordinate of the pixel.
        t - The thickness of the pixels to be set. This value must be odd.
        rgb - The RBG value to set the pixel to.

                int y1,

                int t,

        Parameters:
        x1 - The x coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
        y1 - The y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
        x2 - The x coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle.
        y2 - The y coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle.
        t - The thickness of the pixels to be set. This value must be odd.
        rgb - The RBG value to set the pixels to.
